entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
